description:
The number of JavaScript APIs grows every day. It's hard to believe so many APIs are supported in every new version of browsers. In this course, we will go through some of the well supported advanced JavaScript APIs.

As there are so many APIs, we have selected the most popular and supported ones. We will teach every API by building a simple application using that API. All the APIs taught in this course work on mobile and desktop browsers.

The APIs we cover in this course are not a part of HTML5 specification. These are APIs belonging to other specification.

This course content will be updated regularly as new APIs arrive and are supported.
title: Advanced JavaScript API's for Web Development
